EnableViewmodelHands.title: Enable Viewmodel Hands
EnableViewmodelHands.tooltip: Adds a hand model to every item and tool when you hold them! Recommended: Enabled

EnableViewBob.title: Enable View Bobbing
EnableViewBob.tooltip: Makes the camera bob while you're moving.

ViewBobXAmount.title: Horizonal Distance
ViewBobXAmount.tooltip: How much the camera bobs from side to side, in units. Recommended: 0.04

ViewBobYAmount.title: Vertical Distance
ViewBobYAmount.tooltip: How much the camera bobs up and down, in units. Recommended: 0.04

ViewBobRollAmount.title: Roll Amount
ViewBobRollAmount.tooltip: How much the camera should roll from side to side while moving, in degrees. Recommended: 0

ViewBobPitchAmount.title: Pitch Amount
ViewBobPitchAmount.tooltip: How much the camera should rotate up and down while moving, in degrees. Recommended: 0

EnableToolBob.title: Enable Tool Bobbing
EnableToolBob.tooltip: Makes the item you're holding bob while you're moving.

ToolBobXAmount.title: Horizontal Distance
ToolBobXAmount.tooltip: The distance the tool moves side to side while running, in units. Recommended: 0.02

ToolBobYAmount.title: Vertical Distance
ToolBobYAmount.tooltip: The distance the tool moves up and down while running, in units. Recommended: 0.01

ToolBobZAmount.title: Forward Distance
ToolBobZAmount.tooltip: The distance the tool moves forward and backward while running, in units. Recommended: 0

ToolBobRollAmount.title: Roll Amount
ToolBobRollAmount.tooltip: The angle the tool rolls from side to side while running, in degrees. Recommended: 0

ToolBobPitchAmount.title: Pitch Amount
ToolBobPitchAmount.tooltip: The angle the tool pitches up and down while running, in degrees. Recommended: 1

EnableToolSway.title: Enable Tool Sway
EnableToolSway.tooltip: When enabled, the tool will lag behind the camera as you look around.

ToolSwayTranslateAmount.title: Maximum Distance
ToolSwayTranslateAmount.tooltip: The maximum distance the tool can sway, in units. Recommended: 0.1

ToolSwayRotateAmount.title: Maximum Angle
ToolSwayRotateAmount.tooltip: The maximum angle the tool can sway, in degrees. Recommended: 15

ToolSwaySmoothing.title: Smooth Time
ToolSwaySmoothing.tooltip: The amount of time it takes for the held item to sway halfway back to its normal position, in seconds. Recommended: 0.2

DynamicToolPosBehavior.title: Dynamic Tool Position Behavior
DynamicToolPosBehavior.tooltip: When enabled, you will hold items in a different position depending on how far up/down you are looking. Recommended: Default

DynamicToolPosYAmount.title: Maximum Vertical Distance
DynamicToolPosYAmount.tooltip: The maximum distance the tool will move up or down, in units. Recommended: 0.04

DynamicToolPosZAmount.title: Maximum Forward Distance
DynamicToolPosZAmount.tooltip: The maximum distance the tool will move forward or backwards, in units. Recommended: 0.04

UseJumpAnim.title: Use Jumping Animation
UseJumpAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera shake a bit when you jump, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseFallAnim.title: Use Falling Animation
UseFallAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera sway a bit as you fall, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseLandingAnim.title: Use Landing Animation
UseLandingAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera shake a bit when you land on the ground, based on the view/tool bob amounts you set above. Recommended: Enabled

UseScoutAnim.title: Use Scout Launcher Fire Animation
UseScoutAnim.tooltip: Makes the camera and scout launcher recoil when you launch a scout. Recommended: Enabled

HideStowedItems.title: Hide Stowed Items
HideStowedItems.tooltip: Makes the item you're holding move fully offscreen when it goes into the stowed position (i.e. if you start using another tool or roasting a marshmallow while holding an item). Recommended: Enabled

UseLeftyMode.title: Enable Lefty Mode
UseLeftyMode.tooltip: Makes you hold items/tools in your left hand!
